dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3350 IH: Historic Preservation Fund Reauthorization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Turner (for himself, Mr. Blumenauer, Ms. Leger Fernandez, and Mr. Carey) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend title 54, United States Code, to extend funding for the Historic Preservation Fund.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Historic Preservation Fund Reauthorization Act.
Section 303102 of title 54, United States Code, is amended by striking 2023, $150,000,000 and inserting 2033, $250,000,000.
